entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is mentioned as a person who might be killed.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as the Dark Lord's follower and Narcissa's interlocutor.

entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is mentioned as a person who is upset about her son being taken away from her.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is mentioned as a person who is ruthless and supports the Dark Lord.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is mentioned as an organization that Narcissa's son might be serving.

relationships.description: Snape helps Narcissa by pouring her more wine and forcing the glass into her hand.
Bellatrix supports the Dark Lord by saying she would give her sons to serve him.
Narcissa is Draco's mother, as indicated by her reaction to his potential death.
